question: What was name used for Mohammad Ghori in the coins struck and issued in India after his victories?
explanation: In most of the coins issued in India by Ghori's commanders in India, Sri Mahamad Sam is found engraved in Devnagari script. There is a joint coin of Prithvi Raj Chauhan and Mohammad Ghori also in which one sides mentions Sri Prithivi Raj (on Horse) and Sri Mahamad Sam on other side.
